heading: Trading Temporarily Disabled, August 14th
content: While the Diablo 4 Season 5 is going steady, Blizzard just made a communication about trading being temporarily disabled until further investigation of a possible duplication abuse. See below the forum post from We hope you enjoy the Season of the Infernal Hordes with the aid of our guides.
